title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: When compiling with ajc command, a directory named "subpackage" is created under the existing "subpackage" directory.
EB: When compiling with ajc command, no additional "subpackage" directory should be created.
SR:
1. Create a class in a subpackage.
2. Compile the class using ajc -d option: ajc -d subpackage subpackage\Test.java
